name: Sweeney v. Pittsburgh, Appellant; Noftz v. Pittsburgh, Appellant

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
parties: Sweeney v. Pittsburgh, Appellant. Noftz v. Pittsburgh, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Pee Ctjeiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Patterson of the Court below.
opinions.author: Pee Ctjeiam,

attorneys: Thomas F. Barton, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Anne X. Alpern, City Solicitor, for appellant.
John Wirtsman, for appellees, was not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Sweeney v. Pittsburgh, Appellant. Noftz v. Pittsburgh, Appellant.
Argued September 29, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
Thomas F. Barton, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Anne X. Alpern, City Solicitor, for appellant.
John Wirtsman, for appellees, was not heard.
October 15, 1943:
